name: drying_getSupportedCourses
description: This function is used to list the drying modes supported by the dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the supported courses.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to perform on the devices.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to check the supported courses.
